title: Relates to the custody and visitation rights of a sex offender
summary: Prohibits a sex offender from being granted by a court, physical or legal custody of, or unsupervised visitation with a child.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         3548

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 25, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by M. of A. GABRYSZAK, P. RIVERA, GUNTHER -- Multi-Sponsored
         by -- M. of A.  LUPARDO, WEISENBERG -- read once and referred  to  the
         Committee on Correction

       AN  ACT  to amend the correction law, in relation to custody and visita-
         tion rights of a sex offender

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Section 168-w of the correction law, as relettered by chap-
    2  ter  604  of  the  laws  of  2005, is relettered section 168-x and a new
    3  section 168-w is added to read as follows:
    4    S 168-W. PROHIBITION OF CUSTODY AND VISITATION RIGHTS. ANY SEX  OFFEN-
    5  DER  SHALL BE PROHIBITED FROM BEING GRANTED BY A COURT PHYSICAL OR LEGAL
    6  CUSTODY OF, OR UNSUPERVISED VISITATION WITH, A CHILD.
    7    S 2. This act shall take effect on the first of November next succeed-
    8  ing the date on which it shall have become a law.






        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD07726-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to custody and visitation rights of a sex offender
